StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@WaiverID int ,@WaiverCategoryID int ,@WaiverTypeID int ,@WaiverLevelID int ,@E.ec.veDate date.me ,@UserLogin varchar(15))
AS
UPDATE [dbo].[WAIVER] SET [WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID] = @WaiverCategoryID ,[WAIVER_TYPE_ID] = @WaiverTypeID ,[WAIVER_LEVEL_ID] = @WaiverLevelID ,[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = @E.ec.veDate ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [WAIVER_ID] = @WaiverID
